article_title: Grady Memorial Hospital takes hit from Affordable Care Act
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: Andy Miller

og.description: ATLANTA — The financial arithmetic from the Affordable Care Act could inadvertently undermine the safety net in Georgia, the CEO of Grady Health System says.
